crossbar_listing.map: function(doc) { if(doc.pvt_type != 'number' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc._id, {state: (typeof doc.pvt_state !== 'undefined') ? doc.pvt_state : doc.pvt_number_state, features: doc.pvt_features, assigned_to: doc.pvt_assigned_to, used_by: doc.pvt_used_by || '', created: doc.pvt_created, updated: doc.pvt_modified, locality: doc.pvt_locality});}
